mapper.select: SELECT rn, QNA_SEQ ,cq.STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,QNA_TITLE,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG ,cs.store_name FROM (SELECT rownum AS rn, QNA_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,QNA_TITLE,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG FROM CON_QNA WHERE QNA_DELFLAG='N') cq,(SELECT STORE_SEQ ,STORE_NAME FROM CON_STORE )cs WHERE CEIL(rn/5)=#{pnum} AND USER_ID =#{user_id} AND cq.store_seq=cs.store_seq

SELECT rn QNA_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,QNA_TITLE ,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER ,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(ORDER BY QNA_REGDATE DESC) AS rn ,QNA_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID,QNA_TITLE ,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER ,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG FROM CON_QNA WHERE STORE_SEQ =#{store_seq} AND QNA_DELFLAG ='N') WHERE CEIL(rn/5)=#{pnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE con_qna SET QNA_DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE qna_seq=#{qna_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT rn,qna_seq,STORE_SEQ ,store_photo_stored FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(PARTITION BY cq.QNA_SEQ ORDER BY qna_SEQ ) AS rn,cq.qna_SEQ ,cq.STORE_SEQ ,csp.STORE_PHOTO_STORED FROM CON_qna cq,CON_STORE_PHOTO csp WHERE cq.STORE_SEQ =csp.STORE_SEQ AND user_id=#{user_id}) WHERE rn=1
